text: Jonathan "JoJo" Joestar is a fictional character from JoJo's Bizzare Adventure Phantom Blood. His dad is George Joestar, and his adoptive brother is Dio Brando. He is British and lives in the Joestar house with George (his dad) and Dio (his adoptive brother). His wife is Erina and they have 2 kids with each other (1 of them is adopted). Category:Fictional British people Category:JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
title: Jonathan Joestar
